channel.title: Realm of the Mad God
channel.description:
[center][b][u][size=50pt]Realm of the Mad God[/size][/u][/b] [size=24pt][u][b][url=http://www.realmofthemadgod.com/]Click here to play![/url] [url=https://forums.wildshadow.com/]Click here for forums![/url][/b][/u][/size]
[size=14pt]Realm of the Mad God (RotMG) is a multiplayer shooting and co-op game. In my opinion, the best thing about this fantastic game is that it's free. Every player is more than encouraged to buy gold (a currency only gained by real money) which does nothing but make you look more smexy, give you some item storage and allow you to play with more characters per account. That may sound like a big advantage, but it really isn't. Most importantly, it supports Wild Shadow (creators of the game) and your gold is used towards making the game better and providing a living for the developers.
In this thread you can discuss tactics of playing the game, help out the newbies to RotMG by giving some advice and pointers and anything else RotMG-related. There is not yet an official guild for MoparScape on RotMG, but the official guild will be announced here if this thread gets many people playing.[/size]
[size=24pt][b][u][url=https://forums.wildshadow.com/wiki/realm-mad-god/faq]Click here for Frequently Asked Questions![/url][/u][/b][/size]

item.title: Realm of the Mad God
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

The game is basically a grind until you get good equips and some stats maxed out. That’s when you battle end-game enemies and join top guilds.

Quests at level 20 become realm events, monsters compulsory to be killed in order to fight Oryx.

Read full topic

item.title: Realm of the Mad God
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

Found out about this game a week ago, was going to make a thread but I searched before posting…

I really love this game, the graphics are cool, I like the 2D! The game is so interesting and fun.

Currently, I am a level 14 wizard with a T8 robe of illusionist, a T6 staff, a T4 Ring.

The quests are fun becuase it gets harder and harder, although I still feel it need a lot of work. It needs more levels and a different way of playing it instead of small quests.

Read full topic

item.title: Realm of the Mad God

item.title: Realm of the Mad God
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

I play about an 30 minutes a day (average). I have died twice so far. I got to level 19 as a wizard and level 9 as a priest. Pretty fun stuff. Just got finished raiding orynx’s castle. I died ;(. I looked at the leaderboards and its pretty cool. All of the people have different stuff cus there is so much variety.

Game keeps you into it, you can play for an hour and not realize how long you have played.

Read full topic

item.title: Realm of the Mad God
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

It’s really easy to get things beyond tier 2. Go to a realm and zoom your minimap all the way out. Then teleport to clusters of level 20s which are usually in the center of the map. These black and white places are called the godlands. Kill these gods for more improved items (tier 8s) and you’ll also get potions. Potions can be sold to players for items. Most tier 8s are worth 1 speed potion (which are the lowest ranked potions).

Read full topic
